# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(BocchiEngine LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "clang")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "clang++")
add_executable(BocchiEngine "")
set_target_properties(BocchiEngine PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "BocchiEngine")
set_target_properties(BocchiEngine PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/debug")
target_include_directories(BocchiEngine PRIVATE
    Engine
)
target_include_directories(BocchiEngine PRIVATE
    E:/Library/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.3.8/d12e591897c9472fb7d3725fa5811388/include
    C:/VulkanSDK/1.3.231.1/include
    E:/Library/.xmake/packages/v/vulkan-memory-allocator/v3.0.1/c002556f91bb44589ae9a7997252a731/include
    E:/Library/.xmake/packages/v/vulkan-headers/1.3.231+1/0f4cca7c08ae41efa25d8d31c27328a8/include
    E:/Library/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.89/70f284a1b79d48f2af7729f39014238a/include
    E:/Library/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.89/70f284a1b79d48f2af7729f39014238a/include/imgui
    E:/Library/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.89/70f284a1b79d48f2af7729f39014238a/include/backends
    E:/Library/.xmake/packages/s/spdlog/v1.11.0/9f687477cd0342a6895e163907ac0652/include
)
target_compile_definitions(BocchiEngine PRIVATE
    GLFW_INCLUDE_NONE
)
set_target_properties(BocchiEngine PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(BocchiEngine PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(BocchiEngine PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(BocchiEngine PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(BocchiEngine PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(BocchiEngine PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET BocchiEngine PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(BocchiEngine PRIVATE
    glfw3
    opengl32
    vulkan-1
    imgui
    user32
    shell32
    gdi32
    imm32
)
target_link_directories(BocchiEngine PRIVATE
    E:/Library/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.3.8/d12e591897c9472fb7d3725fa5811388/lib
    C:/VulkanSDK/1.3.231.1/lib
    E:/Library/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.89/70f284a1b79d48f2af7729f39014238a/lib
)

    Engine/editor/source/main.cpp
    Engine/runtime/core/log/log_system.cpp
    Engine/runtime/Engine.cpp
    Engine/runtime/function/global/global_context.cpp
    Engine/runtime/function/render/render_system.cpp
